<h1 class="govuk-heading-xl govuk-!-margin-top-6 govuk-!-margin-bottom-6">Charts and Graphs</h1>

<h2 class="govuk-heading-l">Pie Chart</h2>

<h3>StringsCraig's Coding in 20 Years</h3>

<div class="govuk-body govuk-!-margin-bottom-6">
```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

labels = ['Craig Actually Coded', "Craig Should've Coded"]
sizes = [2, 98]
colors = ['#1d70b8', '#f3f2f1']

def make_autopct(labels):
    def inner_autopct(pcts):
        def format_function(pct):
            # Use current index from nonlocal variable
            label = labels[format_function.idx]
            result = f"{label}: {pct:.1f}%"
            format_function.idx += 1
            return result
        format_function.idx = 0
        return format_function
    return inner_autopct

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(5,5))
autopct_func = make_autopct(labels)(sizes)
wedges, texts, autotexts = ax.pie(
    sizes,
    colors=colors,
    autopct=autopct_func,
    startangle=90,
    textprops={'fontsize': 16, 'color': '#0b0c0c'}
)
ax.axis('equal')
plt.show()
plt.close(fig)
```
</div>

<p class="govuk-body">In 20 years, Craig coded only 2% of the time, but could have coded 98%.</p>
